meanings: (있던 곳에서 다른 곳으로) leave, (formal) depart, go off (to)
(출발하다) leave, start off, set off, (formal) depart, (차량이) pull out

vlive.korean: 아 제가 하고 싶었던 말이... 생각해보세요 어떻게 제가 스테이를 떠날 수 있겠어요? I mean, you think about it. How could I ever leave you guys? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 53 - SEASON 2
vlive.english: I mean, you think about it. How could I ever leave you guys?

vlive.korean: 떠날 필요가 없습니다 맞죠 원스들? I don't need to leave. Right, ONCE? 듣기 View video TWICE : [AutoCut_sana] TWICE 2Q 하이라이트
vlive.english: I don't need to leave. Right, ONCE?

vlive.korean: 아로하... 아로하 같이 떠날... 떠날래요? AROHA... AROHA... Do you want to together... Do you want to leave? 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] 행복스트로💜
vlive.english: AROHA... AROHA... Do you want to together... Do you want to leave?

vlive.korean: 떠나? - 뭐? - 떠날 거야? Leave? - What? - You're leaving? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 산 VS 민기 챔피언전🏆
머리는 한국 떠날 때. My hair, when we left Korea. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 샌프란시스코 나잇🐹
vlive.english: My hair, when we left Korea.

examples.korean: She astonished us by saying she was leaving. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 떠날 거라고 말해서 우리를 깜짝 놀라게 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She astonished us by saying she was leaving. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Many refugees have been forced to flee their homeland. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 많은 난민들이 자기 조국을 떠날 수밖에 없었던 사람들이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Many refugees have been forced to flee their homeland. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I was preparing to leave. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 떠날 각오를 하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I was preparing to leave. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Be set to leave by 10 o’clock 듣기 Add to Wordbook 10시까지는 떠날 준비를 하고 있어라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Be set to leave by 10 o’clock Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We’ll leave after lunch. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 점심 식사 후에 떠날 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’ll leave after lunch. Add to Wordbook
